title: How to Make Dutch Coffee

tyn: Warmed glasses suitable for hot liquids
text: Whip the cream until stiff. If the hot coffee isn't already made, do so now. Pour the Advocaat evenly into four warmed glasses.  Sweeten the hot coffee. Add sugar to taste. Pour the sweetened hot coffee into the glasses. Again, divide into even amounts. Top each glass with whipped cream. Aim to make a small peak. Dust the top of the drink and whipped chocolate. Dust with even amounts of instant coffee powder and cocoa powder. Serve immediately. Provide long-handled spoons for stirring and lifting out the whipped cream.
